mapper.sql: order_id, order_type, pay_type, sys_order_id, ext_order_id, pos_no, card_type, buyer_id, buyer_name, carrier_id, carrier_name, plat_id, plat_name, plat_shop_id, shop_id, shop_name, trade_from, trade_status, order_status, refund_id, refund_status, refund_time, refund_sponsor, refund_type, refund_reason, flow_status, is_valid, origin_price, order_price, ship_price, coupon_price, discount_price, to_zero_price, pay_price, dib_price, recept_price, package_price, point_fee, bonus_price, rate_price, is_settlemented, receive_name, province_id, province, city_id, city, district_id, district, address, longitude_address, latitude_address, mobile, zip_code, memo, buyer_notes, seller_notes, is_invoice, is_trave, invoice_type, invoice_title, invoice_content, order_time, pay_time, delivery_time, confirm_time, print_count, cash_id, cash_name, settle_time, shift, is_read, created_time, updated_time, updated_name, created_name
mapper.select: select order_id from bus_order where order_id like concat(#{orderId},'%') order by order_id desc

SELECT sum(a.origin_price) as origin_price, sum(a.order_price) as order_price, sum(a.ship_price) as ship_price, sum(a.coupon_price) as coupon_price, sum(a.discount_price) as discount_price, sum(a.to_zero_price) as to_zero_price, sum(a.pay_price) as pay_price, sum(a.dib_price) as dib_price, sum(a.recept_price) as recept_price, sum(a.package_price) as package_price, sum(a.point_fee) as point_fee, sum(a.bonus_price) as bonus_price FROM bus_order a

select o.order_id as o_order_id, o.order_type as o_order_type, o.pay_type as o_pay_type , o.pos_no as o_pos_no, o.buyer_id as o_buyer_id, o.buyer_name as o_buyer_name, o.carrier_id as o_carrier_id, o.carrier_name as o_carrier_name, o.shop_id as o_shop_id, o.shop_name as o_shop_name, o.trade_from as o_trade_from, o.trade_status as o_trade_status, o.order_status as o_order_status, o.flow_status as o_flow_status, o.origin_price as o_origin_price, o.order_price as o_order_price, o.coupon_price as o_coupon_price, o.discount_price as o_discount_price, o.to_zero_price as o_to_zero_price, o.pay_price as o_pay_price, o.dib_price as o_dib_price, o.recept_price as o_recept_price, o.is_settlemented as o_is_settlemented, o.receive_name as o_receive_name, o.address as o_address, o.mobile as o_mobile, o.memo as o_memo, o.order_time as o_order_time, o.delivery_time as o_delivery_time, o.print_count as o_print_count, o.cash_id as o_cash_id, o.cash_name as o_cash_name, o.settle_time as o_settle_time, d.goods_id as d_goods_id, d.order_id as d_order_id , d.line_no as d_line_no, d.goods_type as d_goods_type, d.product_type as d_product_type, d.category_code as d_category_code, d.category_name as d_category_name, d.bar_code as d_bar_code, d.brand_code as d_brand_code, d.brand_name as d_brand_name, d.goods_name as d_goods_name, d.sku as d_sku, d.parent_sku as d_parent_sku, d.sku_id as d_sku_id, d.parent_sku_id as d_parent_sku_id, d.en_unit as d_en_unit , d.qty as d_qty, d.unit as d_unit, d.convert_qty as d_convert_qty, d.convert_unit as d_convert_unit, d.market_price as d_market_price, d.origin_sale_price as d_origin_sale_price, d.sale_price as d_sale_price, d.part_price as d_part_price, d.coupon_price as d_coupon_price, d.discount_price as d_discount_price, d.total_price as d_total_price, d.cost_price as d_cost_price, d.rate_precent as d_rate_precent, d.is_gift as d_is_gift, d.gift_count as d_gift_count, d.gift_price as d_gift_price, d.is_show as d_is_show, d.property as d_property, d.memo as d_memo, d.created_time as d_created_time, d.updated_time as d_updated_time, p.pay_id as p_pay_id, p.order_id as p_order_id , p.line_no as p_line_no , p.vip_id as p_vip_id, p.shop_id as p_shop_id, p.shop_name as p_shop_name, p.card_no as p_card_no, p.pay_mode as p_pay_mode, p.pay_type as p_pay_type, p.bank_account_name as p_bank_account_name, p.bank_account_no as p_bank_account_no, p.bank_name as p_bank_name, p.buyer_name as p_buyer_name, p.buyer_account as p_buyer_account, p.pay_price as p_pay_price, p.recept_price as p_recept_price, p.dib_price as p_dib_price, p.over_amount as p_over_amount, p.discount_amount as p_discount_amount, p.memo as p_memo, p.trade_time as p_trade_time from bus_order o left join bus_goods d on d.order_id = o.order_id left join bus_pay_account p on p.order_id = o.order_id where o.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by d.sku asc

update bus_order
order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
sys_order_id = #{sysOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ext_order_id = #{extOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pos_no = #{posNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_type = #{cardType,jdbcType=CHAR},
buyer_id = #{buyerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
buyer_name = #{buyerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carrier_id = #{carrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carrier_name = #{carrierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plat_id = #{platId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plat_name = #{platName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plat_shop_id = #{platShopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shop_name = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_from = #{tradeFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_status = #{tradeStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
refund_id = #{refundId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refund_status = #{refundStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
refund_time = #{refundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
refund_sponsor = #{refundSponsor,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
refund_type = #{refundType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
refund_reason = #{refundReason,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
flow_status = #{flowStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=BIT},
origin_price = #{originPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ship_price = #{shipPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
coupon_price = #{couponPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
discount_price = #{discountPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
to_zero_price = #{toZeroPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pay_price = #{payPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
dib_price = #{dibPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
recept_price = #{receptPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
package_price = #{packagePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
point_fee = #{pointFee,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bonus_price = #{bonusPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rate_price = #{ratePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_settlemented = #{isSettlemented,jdbcType=BIT},
receive_name = #{receiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longitude_address = #{longitudeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude_address = #{latitudeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zip_code = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
buyer_notes = #{buyerNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seller_notes = #{sellerNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_invoice = #{isInvoice,jdbcType=BIT},
is_trave = #{isTrave,jdbcType=BIT},
invoice_type = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
invoice_title = #{invoiceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoice_content = #{invoiceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
confirm_time = #{confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
print_count = #{printCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cash_id = #{cashId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cash_name = #{cashName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
settle_time = #{settleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
shift = #{shift,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
is_read = #{isRead,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_name = #{updatedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_name = #{createdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
